0.1.1.name: wordpress/google-auto-post
0.1.1.description:
This plugin works around the Google Plus block for auto-publishing by linking in through Google Voice. It gives you a way to automatically share your posts to Google Plus from the WordPress post-editing screen. It works by firing off an email to the Google Voice email address, which is then posted to Google Plus.

IMPORTANT: Setup Information

Notes: Setup requires taking advantage of a loophole in Google Voice which allows you to post to Google+ via email. To start, make sure you have a Google Plus account and a Google Voice account under the same email address.

  1. Log in to Google Voice. Click on the Settings "Gear" icon in the upper-right corner.

  2. Verify you have a Google Voice phone number. If you don't, select one.

  3. Click on the "Voicemail & Text" tab. Check the box next to "Forward text messages to my email."

  4. Click on "Text," and compose a message to 33669 (in the USA) or 9222222222 (in India).
